query:
SELECT
            (
                SELECT id
                FROM builds
                WHERE
                    builds.rid = releases.id AND
                    builds.build_status = 'success'
                ORDER BY build_finished DESC
                LIMIT 1
            ) AS "latest_build_id?: BuildId"
         FROM releases
         INNER JOIN crates ON releases.crate_id = crates.id
         WHERE
             name = $1 AND
             version = $2
